name: #2 Feeling Monochromatic
description:
Second photograph of my "Blue Monday" collection.

It was a cloudy day, it had rained the day before, no one in Central Park was talking.

Suddenly, a group of women were walking across chatting, laughing and shouting. They were having a great time. They all had blue umbrellas. Suddenly their energy was contagious, people in Central Park started chatting, laughing, even dancing. In a moment everything changed. These ladies made us feel the joy of the moment in a second.

From one moment to the other, we all felt monochromatic.
